contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is directed to dispose of Petitioner’s Post Conviction Relief Act petition within 90 days of this order. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
